Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm having the problem that the game will start loading but then it will say there is an issue with my edu copy and it gets halfway through the loading bar and then it closes itself. Is there a solution for this?

Hi @videomaster223, have you tried contacting TeacherGaming?, they license KSP from Squad and any errors specific to them would be for them to provide support for.

If it is a more generic error please see this thread.

We'll need more information in the form of your game logs and system specification.
